title: Kiss Person Woman

verbs: Used to signify a kiss or a loving embrace.
nouns: Represents romantic partnerships and tender moments.

description: Represents a kiss between two people, often interpreted as a couple. It conveys romance, affection, and love.
apple_vendor_description: The kiss-person-woman emoji on Apple devices showcases a tender moment, with a woman‚Äôs face leaning in for a kiss, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and exquisite detail. Her lips are softly parted, depicted with smooth gradients that give them a plump, inviting appearance, while realistic lighting highlights her cheek and subtly closed eyes, conveying warmth and affection. The overall design emphasizes gentle emotion and romantic sentiment, making this emoji a heartfelt way to express love, endearment, or a loving goodbye in digital messages on Apple devices.
